item.title: Visualising NuGet Dependencies
item.description: My new place of work has a lot of nuget packages, and I wanted to understand the dependencies between them. To do this I wrote a simple shell script to find all the packages.config files on my machine, and output all the relationships in a way which I could view them. The format for viewing I use for this is Graphviz’s dot language, and the resulting output can be pasted into WebGraphviz to view.
